clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Audit on the Use of Upper Endoscopy in Assist University Children Hospital
clinical_study.official_title: Clinical Audit on the Use of Upper Gastrointestinal Endoscopy in Assiut University Children Hospital

brief_summary.textblock: this protocol aides to evaluate:( 1)whether upper gastrointestinal endoscopy (UGE) is used appropriately according to the Guideline on pediatric GI endoscopy [1] commissioned by the European Society for Paediatric Gastroenterology Hepatology and Nutrition(ESPGHAN) and the European Society of Gastrointestinal Endoscopy(ESGE). In our hospital setting and(2) whether there is any relationship between appropriateness of gastrointestinal endoscopy and the presence of lesions detected by endoscopy.

detailed_description.textblock:
gastrointestinal endoscopy is a safe and effective procedure.
